testcase.name: codestats.UnitTests.testSimpleTextLayoutSummaryOnly

failure.message:
expected: <Root/ ├── code-example-with-scope-comments.cpp ├── code-example.cpp └── Subdir/ └── another-example.java
REPORT ‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾‾ src/main/resources/Root/Subdir/another-example.java: Total single-line comments: 2 Empty single-line comments: 0 Total multi-line comments: 0 Total lines with comments: 2

> but was: <Root/ WHOLE PROJECT: Total single-line comments: 5 Empty single-line comments: 1 Total multi-line comments: 0 Total lines with comments: 5 >
